summary: enchantment that allows you to draw your bow faster.
descriptionHtml:
increase your bow draw speed with this enchantment unintended side effect it also increases the attack speed of other weapons.

[color=#00ff00]update[/color] V1.0.1
changed enchantment name to Quick Draw and tried to make it work with bows only ~
also changed the speed bonus and removed the % value from the tool tip because it didn't show the right value anyway :)
added new gloves that change the attack speed to normal speed (experimental)
name for the console [b]"heavy iron gauntlets"[/b]

due to lack of time the only way to currently get the gloves is through the console!
a short and simple instruction to get the gloves with the console for those who don't know
#1 open the console [b]~[/b]
#2 type [b]help "Comfortable Iron Gauntlets"[/b]
#3 type [b]player.additem <itemID> <count>[/b]
author: beagle547
